message: Dear Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product to you. It's worth an incredible $15000 to you, and we're offering it to you today at a special price. We understand that this investment could be significant, so we're proposing a price that reflects its true value while also considering your budget. Our offer is $14000. This is a fantastic opportunity to secure such a valuable asset at a price that's both fair and advantageous for you. Let us know if you have any questions or need further details about the product. We look forward to your consideration.
